about_the_game:
Road Toad invites players into a world where whimsy meets challenge, delivering a unique twist on the classic arcade experience. As the goofy amphibian protagonist, navigate through captivating minimalist landscapes, encountering a variety of obstacles and dynamic challenges.
  • Charming Minimalism: Road Toad boasts a visually appealing, minimalist art style that adds a touch of charm to the gameplay.
  • Quirky Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the world of Road Toad with a playful and goofy musical backdrop that complements the game's silly atmosphere.
  • Dynamic Gameplay: Encounter a variety of obstacles and challenges as you guide your toad through themed levels, each offering a unique and engaging experience.
  • Power-Up Bonanza: Experiment with an array of power-ups, and stay on your toes as we continue to introduce new strategic elements based on player feedback.
  • Community-Driven Development: Join us in shaping the future of Road Toad! Engage with the community, share your thoughts, and witness the game evolve through regular updates and additions.
detailed_description:
Road Toad invites players into a world where whimsy meets challenge, delivering a unique twist on the classic arcade experience. As the goofy amphibian protagonist, navigate through captivating minimalist landscapes, encountering a variety of obstacles and dynamic challenges.
  • Charming Minimalism: Road Toad boasts a visually appealing, minimalist art style that adds a touch of charm to the gameplay.
  • Quirky Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the world of Road Toad with a playful and goofy musical backdrop that complements the game's silly atmosphere.
  • Dynamic Gameplay: Encounter a variety of obstacles and challenges as you guide your toad through themed levels, each offering a unique and engaging experience.
  • Power-Up Bonanza: Experiment with an array of power-ups, and stay on your toes as we continue to introduce new strategic elements based on player feedback.
  • Community-Driven Development: Join us in shaping the future of Road Toad! Engage with the community, share your thoughts, and witness the game evolve through regular updates and additions.

name: Road Toad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with DirectX 11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: If you experience suboptimal performance with the minimum system requirements, upgrading your hardware to meet or exceed the recommended specifications will enhance gameplay, ensuring a smoother and more enjoyable experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent with DirectX 11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Road Toad is built on Unreal Engine, and these recommended requirements are intended for an enhanced gaming experience, featuring smoother performance and improved graphical fidelity. A solid-state drive (SSD) is recommended for faster loading times.

short_description: Embark on a whimsical journey with Road Toad, a charming arcade adventure featuring a goofy toad navigating minimalist landscapes, collecting power-ups, and facing quirky challenges.
